I just wanted to clear up some confusion on behalf of my nfo. It says "Self-Extracting Zip", which I was incorrect about and was thinking of another program at that time. The Simgolf is an ISO, so please mount with your favorite tool, install, then copy the crack into the sim golf folder.

Okay a good update.

I know some of you are having trouble installing the game, or dont know how. Please follow this "beginners" guide on my forum. If you still have troubles, please post on the forum.
